member.summary: Creates a new instance of XFileTokenizer.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.SkipNode
member.summary: Skips a node in a .X file and all child nodes; should be called after the opening brace, "{", has been read.

member.summary: Parses an integer from a .X file
member.returns: The integer represented by the next token

member.summary: Parses a float from a .X file
member.returns: The float represented by the next token

member.summary: Parses a string from a .X file
member.returns: The string represented by the next token

member.summary: Reads a generic token from a .X file
member.returns: The next token

member.summary: Reads the next Vector2 in the stream.

member.summary: Reads the next Vector3 in the stream.

member.summary: Reads the next Vector4 in the stream.

member.summary: Reads the next Matrix in the stream.

member.summary: Skips tokens in the stream.
member.returns: The number of tokens to skip.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.SkipName
member.summary: Skips a nodes name and its opening curly bracket.
member.returns: The current instance for cascaded calls.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.ReadName
member.summary: Reads a nodes name and its opening curly bracket.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.SkipToken
member.summary: Skips a token in the stream.

member.name: M:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.Reset
member.summary: Resets the tokenizer to the beginning of the stream.

member.summary: Returns current token while ITERATING through the tokens

member.name: P:Xclna.Xna.Animation.Content.XFileTokenizer.Peek
member.summary: Returns the next token without advancing the stream index

member.summary: True if the index is at the end of the stream.

member.summary: The number of tokens in the stream.
